title: How to Create Personal Blog Using Hexo
content:
# Dependencies
+ Node.js
+ npm


# Install Hexo
if you don't have `node.js` and npm `npm` on your workstation, please visit ... to install the node.js. (npm would be automatically installed if node.js installation is done)
To check whether node.js and npm are successfully installed:
```bash

``` 

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
